creditline: Gift of Richard and Roberta Simmons
description: a. trousers: red and white striped ground with red double woven bands on legs; 42 3/4 X 16 inches at waist; b. shirt: white ground with multi-color double stripes, attached collar and sleeve ends; c. sash: white and red striped ground with green and pink discontinuous supplementary weft patterning and ball fringe; 88 1/2 X 7 1/2 inches including ball fringe
title: Man's Trousers, Shirt and Sash
